Comprehensive IT Solutions

We provide end-to-end technology services under one roof, ensuring your business runs without any digital interruptions.

Software & Digital

Custom software development, OS licensing, and strategic digital consulting.

Network & Security

Firewall security, network infrastructure, and secure intranet solutions.

Hardware & Servers

Supply and installation of upgraded PCs, servers, and essential IT hardware.

CCTV Surveillance

Advanced surveillance systems to monitor and secure your premises 24/7.

IoT Solutions

Smart connected devices and Internet of Things solutions.

Fire Safety

Fire alarm systems, extinguishers, and fire hydrants.

Cloud Services

Integration with AWS, Azure, and Google Cloud.

Power Backup

Inverters, Online UPS, and Solar Panel systems.

AMC & Support

Annual Maintenance Contracts and reliable after-sales support.

About Us

Building Trust Through
Technology & Service

Established in 2075 BS, DeskPro Technology Pvt. Ltd. is a leading technology provider based in Biratnagar. We believe that true growth comes not from the number of sales, but from the trust we build with our clients through exceptional after-sales services.

Comprehensive IT and IoT Solutions in One Place
